meanings.definition: To look about or stare with great curiosity
meanings.sent1: The children rubbernecked at the colorful parade passing by.
meanings.sent2: Tourists rubbernecked at the tall buildings in the city.
meanings.sent3: The cat rubbernecked at the bird outside the window.
meanings.sent4: The detective rubbernecked at the clues, trying to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: The students rubbernecked at the strange experiment in science class.

meanings.definition: A person who stares inquisitively or with great curiosity
meanings.sent1: The rubbernecked in the crowd caught the performer's attention.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the neighborhood rubbernecked due to her nosiness.
meanings.sent3: The little boy was a rubbernecked, always eager to see what was happening.
meanings.sent4: The rubbernecked in the museum seemed to notice every detail in the paintings.
meanings.sent5: The rubbernecked at the zoo was fascinated by the animals' behaviors.
